text: I am a Systems Engineering student, passionate about accessible technology. Since 2024, I have dedicated myself to web development and desktop applications, creating intuitive solutions for users of all levels.

My specialty is front-end development, blending creativity and functionality for modern interfaces. I master web and desktop technologies, allowing me to select the appropriate tools for each project.

I have completed courses in Object-Oriented Programming, Web Design, and PHP, strengthening my development foundation. I work independently and collaborate in multidisciplinary teams, focusing on inclusive innovation and exceptional user experiences.
